summary.span: 取得或設定 HTML 說明檔的發行位置。

span.span: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.

value.span: 當使用 HTML 瀏覽器檢視端點時，使用者所看到的自訂 HTML 說明檔的相對或絕對 HTTP URL。

span.span: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 屬性來啟用從 HTTP/Get 要求 (例如，從 HTML 瀏覽器) 傳回的自訂 HTML 說明檔。Use the property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request such as that of an HTML browser. HTML 說明檔的位置解析如下：The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows: - 如果這個屬性的值是相對位址，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是支援 HTTP 要求的服務基底位址的值，加上這個屬性值。If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests plus this property value. - 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址且支援 HTTP 要求，則 HTML 說明檔的位置就是這個屬性的值。If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property. - 如果這個屬性的值是絕對位址，但不支援 HTTP 要求，便會擲回例外狀況。If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown. 當 屬性是 `true` 時，才能套用這個屬性。This property is applied only in the case that the property is `true`.
